Class MainPanel

java.lang.Object
MainPanel
public class MainPanel extends Object
The MainPanel class represents the graphical user interface (GUI) panel for managing books within a Library Management System (LMS). It provides functionality for deleting and checking in/out books, displaying book information in a table, and handling user interactions.
